Description: A simple brush-based trigger which triggers its target when a players enters it and whenever something enters it or is still inside of it when its delay before reset runs out. In simple words, this entity works as the [trigger_once](../trigger_once) does, except this can be triggered multiple times.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Time, in seconds, the trigger_multiple can fire it's target again after touched.
Set name of {{ entname }}. Can be kill-targeted.
Entity to trigger when {{ entname }} is touched (or when stop touched if "Fire On Exit" flag is selected).
Entity to remove when {{ entname }} is touched (or when stop touched if "Fire On Exit" flag is selected).

Issues: Monsters are only able to trigger brush trigger entities while moving inside of them.
